name: VIP MUD Soundpack for Miriani
short_description: Created for both sighted and visually impaired players alike, the VIP MUD Soundpack for Miriani offers enhancements to gameplay within Miriani specifically for the VIP MUD client. Offering sounds, macros and tools to make your gameplay more enjoyable, this add-on intends to provide a level playing field for both sighted and blind players and an easy-to-use experience for everyone from the first-time Miriani player to the seasoned Miriani pro. For more information on Miriani, please visit http://www.toastsoft.net.
summary: Soundpack add-on for the Miriani MOO hosted at www.toastsoft.net
